title: PMV®-01 for tomato growing
description: Vaccination against PepMV damage on tomatoes
cleaned_text: inoculated with an aggressive PepMV isolate 3 weeks after the vaccination date. The PMV®-01 vaccinated crops showed no loss of quality and production in all GEP trials performed. In these 4 GEP trials, the non-vaccinated crops showed average production losses ranging from 7 to 11%. GEP: Good Experimental Practice.
